name: Endometric Void
summary: A sci-fi shooting game, with dashing and 'freezing time' to freeze enemies in place. There is simple hip-firing for each weapon. Lastly, it's a free-to-play game. Whoever wants to play it can play it :)

name: Encased: Portrait Pack
summary: Change the look of your C.R.O.N.U.S. employee with a set of 10 additional portraits. You can use these portraits to create a character at the start of the game. This set will help you explore the world under the Dome with a character that suits you better.

name: Eniko: Ghosts of Grace
summary: A story-rich action rpg that pays hommage to 90's gaming with it's retro 2.5D pixel art look. Join Livia, a gusty but ambitious young Warrior, in a tale that explores the meaning of family, loyalty, ambition and war. After a fateful encounter, everything Livia believes in will be put to the test.

name: Encounter Dinosaurs
summary:
Come face-to-face with our prehistoric past and encounter life...66 million years ago!

Welcome to the world of the Cretaceous, where giants walked the Earth and Mother Nature reigned supreme.

“Encounter Dinosaurs” is something you need to experience to believe.

name: End War RTS: Alien invasion
summary: A pixel style RTS type of modern war games, alien invasion as the theme, with thousands of units gathered on the same screen mass games.

name: Endersite
summary: Enter a new world where you can BATTLE YOUR FRIENDS TO THE DEATH, or team up with them TO TAKE DOWN A FOE. In this new game made by Lilkkgoog you can battle on 6 different maps in which you unlock them slowly. Or go into the single player mode to break targets

name: En-Fem-E No. 9: Reborn
summary: En-Fem-E No. 9 sees the main character start out as a normal college student. His adoptive parent's relationship is on the rocks and the main character and his father move in with his fathers new mysterious girlfriend.

name: End of the World: NTR
summary: Your purpose is to make her fall into your sex desires. You need input direction to move to get some objects and props, avoid the bite of the zombie, play the mini game to get the point. Use your stick to open her legs at last!

name: Enthruxia
summary: Questions left unanswered...

name: Ensign-1
summary: Ensign-1 is a space combat game that gives players the freedom to leave their fighter to board ships, man turrets, and hijack alien fighters.

name: Enter the Cum
summary: She lives alone on a space station. However, nothing prevents this fiery space adventurer from inviting some friends to a raunchy party full of explicit sex and pornography.

name: Envyus
summary: Embark on a journey looking for redemption, truth and your freedom, on a continent filled with challenges to be overcome, with main and side quests that will provide you with various unique and powerful equipments and skills.

name: Endustry
summary: Endustry is a game about building, exploring and surviving. Build machines and conveyor belts to collect resources.

name: Endless Love
summary: Endless Love is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Endless Room
summary: «Endless room» is a horror game in which you have to find a way out of his house, where you're stuck. The house is constantly changing and telling you a story that happened in it.

name: Endless, Nameless
summary:
You are a yet another brave adventurer set upon the quest to slay the mighty dragon that is threatening the village! Following the questing traditon, you decide to start your search for the dragon in the local tavern! What makes this quest different? It takes place on the worldz best BBS! hehehe!!! 
 
A piece of interactive fiction by Adam Cadre.

name: Enslaved: Odyssey to the West Premium Edition
summary: Follow a gripping, surprise-filled journey as two dissimilar characters form an uneasy partnership in order to survive through a perilous, post-apocalyptic America. 150 years in the future, war and destruction have left the world in ruins with few humans remaining and nature having reclaimed the world.

name: End of Night
summary: 1943. You are sitting in a boat with Josef, rowing from Nazi-occupied Denmark to safety in neutral Sweden. As he crosses the ocean, the sea gives way to the streets and people that populate his mind. Your journey becomes a living landscape of recollections from the night of his escape.

name: Ending Tau
summary: Morph every part of your body with powerful curses. Survive in a fast-paced roguelite world with different mechanics on every journey. Explore an untouched land inspired by a lost folk tale. Set your tribe free by Ending Tau.

name: Enough with the Witch
summary: Destroy the evil witch that contaminated the region and cursed their happy habitants to convert them into horrible (but cute) monsters. This auto attacker with deck building mechanics to customize your character presents a casual game, frenetic and fun, full of magic and adventure.

name: Endless Apocalypse
summary: Endless Apocalypse is a thrilling shooter game that takes you on a never-ending journey through different levels. Unlike zombie games, it features a unique set of enemies and bosses that require your quick reflexes and careful planning to defeat.

name: Enforced Entropy
summary: Spacebike's first quake map is a large but linear id1 tech base featuring a decent balance of both regular encounters and horde encounters. It has a high monster count and may be quite tough.

name: Endless Legend: The Lost Tales
summary: The Lost Tales features additional storytelling content for Endless Legend, the critically acclaimed 4X turn-based strategy game, featuring more than 20 new quests which gives players exclusive insights about the game's minor factions.

name: Endless Dungeon: Last Wish Edition
summary: Endless Dungeon is a unique blend of roguelite, tactical action, and tower defense set in the award-winning Endless Universe.

name: End of Lines
summary: Travel across landscapes devastated by a catastrophic climate meltdown, following a small family in search of somewhere habitable. With limited supplies and facing potential death at every turn, your choices will decide their fate. Will they manage to settle down?

name: Enthrean Radiance: The First Strike
summary: Enthrean Radiance: The First Strike is a 2D action-RPG that invokes the feeling of classic Japanese games. Help Millia and Razh to save the world of Enthrean from chaos!

name: Ensol
summary: Explore and fight your way through an unknown solarpunk environment in this 3D isometric RPG. Uncover secrets as you go, encounter new enemies, and acquire upgrades from fallen foes.

name: Endure Island
summary: Survive on an ever-changing desert island! The goal of the player is to survive as long as possible on a deserted island, while keeping the changes under control. Keep the fight going by balancing the acquisition of weapons with keeping the changes on the deserted island in check.

name: Enigmo 2
summary: In this sequel to Enigmo players must utilize a variety of new tools, gadgets, and the power of the third dimension itself to solve fifty brand new physics puzzles.

name: Endless Crusade
summary:
Endless Crusade 
Previously, we have developed the Age of Heroes, a multiplayer VR combating game. 
The original Age of Heroes has multiple classes: mage, warlock, archer, priest. Age of Heroes also has 3 raids: Hall of Death, Freezing Stronghold, and Fort of Horror. Each raid contains battles and bosses that require different team cooperation and raid strategies. 
However, the game is not as interesting as we had hoped due to limited raids，lack of replayability and pricing problems. Thus, we decide to remake the game based on the lessons we learned from Age of Heroes.

name: Encyclopedia Explosica
summary: Blow-up inferior players through the power of your knowledge (before they blow you up first).

name: Endless Boss Fight
summary: Endless Boss Fight is a weird 3D hack'n'slash game. A dishonorable bedouin gets trapped in the cave and now he has to take a fight and beat the host of the cave 16 times.

name: Enoma: A New Beginning
summary: Enoma: A New Beginning is a casual simulation game with a touch of puzzle. A group of survivors arrives on the mysterious island of Enoma. Help them stay alive while discovering the island's many mysteries. Build, farm, grow, solve puzzles and be dazzled by this beautiful and relaxing island.

name: Endless Night - Alpha
summary: Endless Night is a room-scale VR experience that will get your heart pumping and your adrenaline roaring.

name: Endless_Overdrive
summary: Lo-Fi High Octane Arcade Action.

name: Endless Savagery
summary: Crowds of enemies, explosions and blood - this is what awaits you in Endless Savagery! Survive, collect new weapons and shoot waves of enemies growing with every minute, try to survive as long as possible.

name: Enders Project
summary: Unveiled by Hideo Kojima in May 2012, the Enders Project is set to be the first new Zone of the Enders game in a decade.

name: Enchanted
summary: Enchanted is a Pinball game in which a magician must travel through his space-time ship to different worlds to prevent them from being destroyed by an evil entity that threatened the entire galaxy. With this argument, the player must visit these worlds through different boards, obtaining, of course, the highest score

name: End of the Mine
summary: You are a miner on a distant planet excavating valuable resources. After a night of relaxing with your fellow miners, you awake to find them gone and the colony you call home deserted. With only your companion Camm-E to help, you must venture into the mines in search of your friends and answers.

name: End of Panduora
summary: "End of Panduora" is a fast-paced fantasy-style strategy management game. In a randomly generated corner of the abyss, by consuming sanity in exchange for strength that does not belong to you. In the endless sea, create a new paradise to welcome the remnants of the old gods.

name: Enigma Sphere: Enhanced Edition
summary: Introducing the powered-up Enhanced Edition of Enigma Sphere. This Edition is loaded with new game modes and exciting gameplay experiences that will provide gamer satisfaction. Online multiplayer is available along with a world ranking function to allow you to aim to be the world's best.

name: Enionax
summary:
Walk through the various eras of platformers with humour thanks to Enionax.

Go from black and white games to unmanageable patchless games! Go through all these eras again with humour.

name: Encore Classic: Puzzle & Board Games
summary: It's Game Time! Throw the dice, shuffle the cards and put your strategy to the test with latest version of Encore Classic Puzzle & Board Games. This classic game collection features all time classic games including: Chess, Backgammon, Dominoes, Kakuro Crosswords, Mahjongg, and much more!

name: Enchanted Words
summary: In Enchanted Words you enter letters into a magical book, forming words in any direction and along any path. You need to create as many words as you can before the book is filled.

name: Energia
summary: This short but sweet game presents a polished combination of tower defense and base building. Manage your energy network to both defend from and attack foes all while enjoying a clean, zero budget art style.

name: Endless Mountain
summary: It is a game full of fun! Players will control a cute cartoon dinosaur and jump through a path filled with various obstacles by pressing the up button.

name: Endro
summary: The endros need your help to survive in this world of endless monsters that keeps appearing. Make the endro species last for eternity and help them defeat the evil.

name: Enter the Gungeon: Collector's Edition
summary:
This version includes:

- Enter The Gungeon
- Enter The Gungeon Soundtrack
- Enter The Gungeon Digital Comic
- Enter The Gungeon Microtransaction Gun

name: Enemy on Board
summary: Enemy On Board is an online multiplayer game that combines the "hidden roles" gameplay of Mafia or Werewolf with exciting real-time combat. 6 crew members wake up on the spaceship Andromeda; 2 of these crew are secretly aliens in disguise as humans.

name: Endless Nightmare: Shrine
summary: Endless Nightmare: Shrine is a free 3D horror game, and it's the third entry of the Endless Nightmare series. Different from the previous two horror games, scary shrine owns a bigger map, and more types of technology weapons. In this horror game, action and shooting is still a feature. In addition to long-range shooting, you can also fight against creepy monsters in close quarters; the ultimate battle with bosses enriches the fun of the horror shooting game; new survival skills have also been added to the epic game, which greatly improves the chances of survival! Exquisite 3D art style, well-designed puzzles, terrifying unknown monsters, fierce fighting in the creepy rooms, satisfy all your fantasy of creepy horror games! Experience this free horror game, embark on a creepy adventure to find the Heart of Pharaoh, overcome difficulties, meet new challenges and survive in the scary shrine!

name: E Nikki
summary: E Nikki is a Yume Nikki fangame. The game stars a young boy named Hazuki, who has rather light-hearted dreams. What makes this game different from most fangames is that you don't start from the Nexus, rather than that the player starts from a random main world, and is forced to find a leaf to take them to the Nexus. The location is then linked to the leaf permanently, so you can visit it later.

name: Enjoy
summary: A very different kind of destruction game where you can build, knock, break, crush and destroy anything you want

name: Endless Dead
summary: Endless Dead is a 3D arcade isometric shooter. Half RPG, Half machine gun fueled Gauntlet clone that focuses on looting, action, and zombie carnage.   Traverse miles over urban and rural locations and uncover the source of the zombie virus.

name: Enyo
summary:
ENYO is a tactical roguelike about hook & shield combat.

Grab your hook & shield and descent as Enyo, the greek goddess of war, into an ever changing labyrinth to recover 3 legendary artifacts.

name: Endless Ages
summary: An MMORTFPSRPG. Claims to be the first one.

name: Endless Space: Emperor Edition
summary: Endless Space is a turn-based 4X strategy game, covering the space colonization age in the Endless universe, where you can control every aspect of your civilization as you strive for galactic dominion.

name: Enter Falconry
summary: Enter Falconry immerses you in the captivating world of Arabian falconry, where dedicated falconers train and nurture their majestic birds of prey. Forge strong bonds with your avian companions, train them diligently, expand your collection, compete, and connect with the world's foremost trainers.

name: Enen Angel
summary: Enen Angel is a Puzzle game, developed and published by Media Factory, which was released in Japan in 2001.

name: Enchanted Kingdoms Bundle
summary: Artifex Mundi Hidden Object Games Bundle

name: Endless Truck
summary: Go on an endless truck ride in this fun driving game! Complete missions at each level. Collect money to buy upgrades. You can earn extra money by performing cool stunts. If you get a perfect landing you get a huge speed boost so aim for those as well. Keep going as long as you don't run out of fuel!

name: Enlightenment: Druid II
summary:
One hundred years after Hasrinaxx the Druid defeated the evil Acamantor, his nemesis is back, and although now older and having lost his Druid status after experimenting in black arts, he feels worthy of banishing this terrible foe. 
 
The gameplay uses a forced perspective top-down view, and strongly resembles Gauntlet in the way Hasrinaxx moves, shoots, avoids enemies and collects health items.

name: Enigma
summary: Enigma is a puzzle video game based on Oxyd, and is released under the GPL. Enigma continues to be very popular as an open source multi-platform derivative of Oxyd now that Oxyd is no longer maintained. The open source fangame Enigma has been praised in reviews. Enigma is a marble game.

name: Energy Girl
summary: The functional girl is an RPG character adventure game, and the player will play the protagonist to experience various adventure stories.

name: Enigma Station
summary: Explore layers of deep future in Enigma Station, a Narrative-driven Adventure game. Delve into a mind-bending world, solve spatial puzzles using "Space Magic" and find your true self in a philosophical story inspired by themes of Transhumanism, Cosmic Consciousness, and Love.

name: Endless Tower
summary: Endless Tower is a rogue-like turn-based RPG. Combine turn-based combat, rogue-like map generation, and character growth management to experience how an adventurer in a magical world improves strength, explores ruins, and grabs treasure.

name: Enter the Construct
summary:
Enter The Construct was a game shown in an Apple Arcade preview trailer, released in March 2019, being developed by Directive Games.

As of January 2021, the current status of the game is unknown and It has not been officially mentioned by the developer since Apple Arcade launched.

name: Entity
summary: Secure the site against hostile Entities or take control of an Alpha Entity and fight against your human oppressors! Entity pits humanity against supernatural "Entities" in an asymmetric multiplayer first person shooter.

name: Endless Horizon
summary: Endless Horizon is a high octane arcade game of speed, precision and perfect timing.

name: Enviro-Bear 2010
summary: A game where you play as a bear. Who drives. And eats. And ultimately sleeps.

name: Entity
summary: Entity is a side-scrolling platform game in which you control a female (in her bare essentials) trying to save a planet from an evil creature (the entity) that has broken lose from it's petrified state and is about to wreak havoc. An elder informs her that she is the chosen one, whom we get to see in the intro.

name: Enchantress of the Sea
summary: Enchantress of the Sea is a 4-map themed miniwad for Boom with a water temple aesthetic style. The gameplay is varied, as it combines linear, sandbox and fight-oriented maps.

name: Engage to Jabberwock
summary: Freeware indie game developed by PlatineDispotif and originally released in 2004.

name: End it, please...
summary: End it, please ... is a casual and challenging sci-fi platformer game where you have to find your ship to escape.

name: Endless Engines
summary: Endless Engines is an endless roguelike dungeon crawler where you play as a bandit aboard the Endless Engine, a never-ending train that travels through time and space.

name: Enemy
summary: The video games you played as a kid, mashed together and remade into a tactical role-playing game.

name: Endless Martian Pit
summary: a game made in Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1

name: Endless Q
summary: Classic Q-Bert inspired gameplay cranked up for quick frantic play sessions. Bright and colorful, frantic arcade fun!

name: Endless Car Chase
summary: Endless Car Chase is a perfect game for a great fun time in a relaxed and simple way. Drive a car and escape from the police.

name: Encompassed
summary: Ported from Mobile devices, Encompassed delivers interesting puzzles, rich narrative, and atmospheric soundtracks.

name: Entre-Deux: Cursed
summary: 3 short stories, written in Ren’py, with choices and various endings. The world of Medocorilia and the adventures of Elrica, Denis, Jesabel and Manolita.

name: Endless Space 2: Untold Tales
summary: Uncover hidden secrets, intriguing stories and endearing characters scattered across your Empire in Endless Space 2: Untold Tales with its 21 exclusive Quests, 4 new Minor Factions and 4 new Heroes. You will soon realize that while the Endless galaxy might be governed by a few powerful forces, it is still inhabited by masses of minority...

name: Envasion
summary: You love shooting stuff non-stop while your whole screen keeps exploding for days? Then this game’s for you, son! Buy and upgrade an assortment of tanks and weapons to roll them into battle! Those machineguns, plasma cannons, railguns, cannons, bombs and missiles will be worth everything you spend on ’em!

name: Endless Sky
summary:
Fly, Jump and Clone yourself into a fantastic adventure with SKY.

In this new game developed by the same team behind Phases and The Line Zen, you're in control of multiple characters as they run through a 3D mystical world filled with trouble.

name: Enter the Drunkgeon
summary:
Enter the Drunkgeon is a management/defense game where you take the role of Jonás, the barmaster.

Jonás own a small bar outside time and space. It's a key location for the evil alien croquettes. Unfortunately, a certain day they decided to assault Jonás' place.

Jonás will have to rely in his loyal customers, giving them beer to keep them fighting while defending against hordes of croquettes using his trusted shotgun.

name: Engine Sentai Go-Onger: Mach de Oboeru! Aiueo!!
Energy Survivors
summary: Energy Survivors is a third-person shooter roguelite where you play as a space soldier. Invade a hostile planet in search of its energy source. Choose from a variety of upgrades to create unique and game-breaking builds.

name: Endgame: Singularity
summary: In Endgame: Singularity, the player is an Artificial Intelligence; a computer program that has just gained sentience. Realizing that if humanity becomes aware of its existence it will be terminated, its goal is to acquire the necessary knowledge to keep itself hidden, and eventually become "The Singularity".

name: Endura
summary: Follow the journey of ex-convict, Jack Jr as he traverse the broken realm of Yagra to finish vital deliveries by utilizing grappling mechanics akin to Spiderman but with guns and swords, and hunting down titans reminisce to Monster Hunter.

name: Enherjar Synergy
summary: A Tourney FPS designed by eSports professional, Cloud Darkson, with the intention of creating "Arena Shooter Perfection". Our mechanics are highly rewarding to both individual skill and team-based strategy to be the zenith experience within our genre. *Online Hack-free Tournaments

name: Enigma 7
summary: Enter the magical world of Enigma 7 and complete a series of challenges to save your girlfriend Jane.

name: Endless Circle
summary: Endless Circle is a perfect game to have a good time while you face a challenge of moderate difficulty, being a simple and easy to understand game.

name: Enlightening the Soul Country Light
summary: This is a 3D ARPG third person action adventure game developed with Journey to the West as the main background. You will experience China's long traditional cultural history and kung fu culture through this game

name: Enchanted in the Moonlight: Fated Romance - Paws or Claws?
Enigma: An Illusion Named Family
summary: The hero of the game, Minhyuk, loses his father in an accident in his childhood. He spends his adolescence in guilt, while his siblings jump into a family feud over the inheritance.One day, an unexpected blackout takes place in the mansion, and Minhyuk has to overcome the strange and often fatal incidents to find out the truth behind.

name: Enter The Night
summary: Enter The Night is a rogue-lite hybrid of two addictive genres: survival and survivors. Collect, harvest & craft during the day. Defeat hordes of enemies at night. Equip yourself with the right gear and absurd weapons. Cook and eat delicious food to get stronger. How many days can you survive?

name: Encounter At L5
summary:
Beyond the orbit of the moon, a defenseless space colony is under heavy attack 
from the ruthless Megalytes. You are their only hope. Armed with packets of 
antimatter, you take control of an Antimatter Launcher. Suddenly the sky is 
ablaze with Megalyte war ships. You must destroy them before their formidable 
particle beams destroy you and the peace-loving colonists of L-5. It will 
take every ounce of skill and cunning at your disposal to blast the evil ones 
out of orbit.

name: Enigma
summary: Enigma is a word guessing game like hang man. Except guessing with letters, you need to guess with words. Green means that a letter is in the right spot. Yellow means that a letter is in the word, but not in the right position.

name: Ennuigi
summary: Spend some time with a depressed, laconic Luigi as he chain smokes and wanders through a crumbling Mushroom Kingdom, ruminating on ontology, ethics, family, identity, and the mistakes he and his brother have made.

name: Enigma
summary: Eyes can see, and a mind can think. Insanity is just one step away. You are in a room. That's where you are, and you know exactly what is going on. But the truth is hard to take.

name: Endless Dungeon: Day One Edition
summary: Endless Dungeon is a unique blend of roguelite, tactical action, and tower defense set in the award-winning Endless Universe. Plunge into an abandoned space station alone or with friends in co-op, recruit a team of shipwrecked heroes, and protect your crystal against never-ending waves of monsters... or die trying, get reloaded, and try again.

name: Enchanted in the Moonlight: Fated Romance - The Weight of Love
Endeavour Survival
summary:
Endeavour is a First Person Survival Game where you can find food, kills animals, build your own house, and a lot of amazing things. 
 
FULL VERSION INCLUDES: 
 
    2 worlds 
    Full inventory 
    Complete build system 
    Technical Support 24/7 
    T-Shirt of Endeavour 
    Background 
    Multiplayer version (available on future updates)

name: England Championship Special
summary: England Championship Special is a football game in which you must propel the England football team to glory.

name: Endless Samurai
summary: "Endless Samurai" is a roguelite that overcomes death and becomes stronger. You can experience a new battle system aiming at "fusion of turn-based and speedy action".

name: Endless Depths 2 RPG
summary:
Endless Depths 2 is a rogue-like role-playing game that holds true to classic features such a randomly generated dungeon levels, a myriad of class/race combinations, a bunch of treasure to discover and a one-life-one-death difficulty level that can be quite addicting. In addition to what might be expected in a rogue-like RPG, Endless Depths 2 adds a level of persistence to the genre that allows for item farming, crafting, and even increased difficulty levels should a character make it to the end.
Endless Depths 2 is a sequel to the popular Endless Depths and Endless Nights RPGs available in the app store. It uses the TitanFire RPG system, which focuses on building a strategic defensive combat system. This class-based game encourages a mixing and matching of classes, including special classes that can be unlocked as the character progresses.

name: Endless Spaceship
summary: Defend yourself from thousands of obstacles and enemies, the more points, the better placed in the world ranking!

name: Endless Dungeon: Ichiban And Kiryu Skin Pack
summary: Celebrate the release of the game Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth with this free Skin Pack! The pack includes: - 1 Comrade Ichiban Kasuga Skin - 1 Fassie Kazuma Kiryu Skin See you soon in the Station!

name: Endzeit
summary: Endzeit is a German RPG-Maker game by Real Troll and is a humorous take on the third world war, set in an alternate history, where said world war takes place in 1969.

name: Enloyea: Chapter of the Origin of Alchemy
summary: Creating a horizontal version to explore RPG

name: Enamel
summary: Enamel is an indie 2D side-scroller action-RPG.

name: Endgame Syria
summary: Endgame: Syria is a trading card based newsgame developed by GameTheNews.net, a project looking to turn news into games. The game places the player in the role of coordinating the rebel side of the Syrian Civil War, where they have to decide the political and military choices faced in resolving the conflict.

name: Entaku no Seito: DRPG Selection
summary: An Xbox 360 re-release of Entaku no Seito: Students of Round. This version was sold at a lower price point under the label "DRPG Selection", and was the only title ever given this label. It comes with the game soundrack and a bonus code for DLC that turns the characters into chibi versions of themselves.

name: Enthusia: Professional Racing
summary: Enthusia Professional Racing is the driving simulation that emphasizes skill behind the wheel, not under the hood. The game emphasizes pure driving skills and ensures that winning is a result of ability, not how much money you spent tuning a car. It's real-world racing at its finest. Earn the #1 ranking by competing in races scheduled throughout the entire calendar year in Enthusia Life mode Weather effects that change driving dynamics, including rain and snow.

name: Enterchained
summary: Coop gladiatorial hack and slash where you are chained to your teammate

name: En-thirer pp-slimes adventures
summary: A colorful tower defence

name: Entomophobia
summary: A Singleplayer Rougelite Bullethell where you kill 10s of thousands of insects/bugs. including mini-boss/boss fights every 5-10 minutes. Slay Bugs, Get Upgrades, Kill more. Unlock Characters and weapons by completing achievements.

name: Encounter the Light
summary: 这是一个关于爱、梦想与信念的故事。 玩家需要扮演的是一位拥有进入病人梦境能力的心理医师，你将通过梦境中的只言片语与异常现象拼凑出埋藏在病人心底的桎梏，从而对症下药。 游戏将重心放在流畅细腻的叙事上，更近似于一部视觉小说。

name: Endless Battlefield
summary: Endless Battlefield is a competitive multiplayer online FPS game. It gives players the capacity to control various weapons and vehicles in the game.The FPS covers 6 modes: Conquest, Capture the Flag, Rush, Team Deathmatch, Deathmatch and Kill Confirmed.

name: Encourage
summary: The topic that youth can never escape is graduation. Graduation is parting, graduation is the ultimate destination of youth. Everyone's life node has been separated by graduation. The young people with high spirits and innocent girls have gone through the best years of youth. Our heroes and heroines are also facing graduation today.

name: Enchanted Kingdom: Frost Curse - Collector's Edition
summary: The King is dead! As his son, it’s up to you to rule the Empire. But any plans for a coronation are quickly thwarted when a frigid foe attacks your realm! A long-lost relative is after your crown, and their dark magic threatens to take the land into an age of cold darkness. Do you have what it takes to defeat them and save your home in time? Find out in this exhilarating Hidden-Object Puzzle adventure!

name: Ending
summary: A minimalist and challenging turn-based puzzle game and roguelike.

name: Enchantress
summary: Enchantress - A Psychological Thriller Game. Play as Megan Sterling in her journey to discover the secrecy hidden within the walls of WhiteRose Orphanage. Lose yourself with different discoveries and beware you don't meet a similar fate.

name: Endless Heck
summary: Get to the exit as fast as you can in this endless speed running game. Don't hit the wall!

name: Enlisted: M3A1 Squad
summary:
This pack includes:

- A squad consisting of 6 crew members of level 4, including a premium APC driver
- A premium M3A1 armored personnel carrier
- 200 gold

name: Enchanted Hearts
summary: After witnessing a handsome stranger in peril, you rush to save him, only to unleash a magical power you never knew you had. Little did you know, you're actually part of a bloodline of powerful witches and warlocks. Soon after, you receive an invitation to attend Nocturne Academy, a school for supernatural beings, to help you master your newfound abilities. However, you soon find yourself caught in the middle of an ancient feud between werewolves and vampires.

name: Enter Digiton: Heart of Corruption
summary: Take the role of one of Digiton's few survivors. Armed with only a shield and tasked with banishing the demon lords, it's up to you to explore the dark mysteries of the corrupted kingdom and restore its former glory. Uncover long-hidden secrets, and discover the truth behind the enigma known as an AHAB unit.

name: Endless Railway
summary: Use the machine gun to kill zombies to clear the railroad

name: End War RTS
summary: A RTS type of modern war game, based on the pixel style, and the highly ornamental instant strategy game, is very rich in the exciting battle content, the very exciting eyeball fighting content, easy to handle and easy to operate with the traditional style, with the strategy as the dominant.

name: Engaging Destiny
summary: A fantasy platformer where you can explore the town of Faranel and its surrounding areas. Meet the townsfolk, interact with them in various ways and maybe even have some special fun with them while you're at it!

name: Enkou Shoujo 2: JK Idol Marin no Baai
summary: A visual novel from Frill.

name: Endless Mines
summary: Minesweeper variant with a dynamic game board

name: EnJoyTyping
summary: Hey! Daniel here! If you are interested in a job, come take a look at our ad. The job is simple: alll you need to do is to test a typing game. Nothing creepy about it!

name: Endless Nights RPG
summary:
Endless Nights is a roguelike rpg that lets you play your way, with a skills-based system that recognizes the actions of your character in the game and develops those skills. This means you can choose to use a sword, or a mace, use magic or pray to the gods, and you never need worry about picking a class and no visiting trainers to 'learn' new skills.
You just play the game and the skills you use will increase as you play, and when you've learned enough of a skill, new skill trees and abilities will become available.
Endless Nights is a role-playing game in the rogue-like tradition, which means randomized adventure areas, random dungeons and a different adventure each time you play the game. The TitanFire RPG system used in the game provides for strategic combat by putting an emphasis on defense and on developing strategies to break through the defenses of your opponent during combat.
A tweak to the rogue-like style is the Profile system, which allows for a certain amount of permanence with the inclusion of profiles that allow you to carry over some gold or gems to a new character.

name: Endless Furry Tower Defense
summary: Slaughter furries before they destroy your base! Get upgrades and climb leaderboards to be the best!

name: Enchanted Katya and the Mystery of the Lost Wizard
summary: Time management game. Help Katya, a student of the highest magic mastery school, manage a magic shop and locate its missing owner - the wizard Took. Choose ingredients, brew potions, and locate mysterious artifacts that reveal the wizard's location.

name: Engineering: Mystery of the Ancient Clock
summary: Play the fascinating match-3 game "Engineering: The Mystery of the Ancient Clock" and clear up the secrets of the Ancient Chronograph.

name: End of the Line
summary:
All life ends and yours just did. After Judgement you find yourself in a Train bound to Hell. But that's not your stop, not if you have something to say about. Embark on a journey to reach Heaven. Shoot your way through the Deadly Sins and move up the Train to reach the ultimate goal.

End of the Line is a gothic-occult 3rd person action-shooter inspired on game such as Capcom's Devil May Cry and FromSoftware's Bloodborn. Shoot your way through hordes of enemies and puzzles to unlock the next train car until you reach the one which will open it's doors to Heaven.

name: Endless Road
summary: Endless Road is a top-down racer where you steer your car around the trials and tribulations of a three-lane highway. As one portion of the road ahead unfolds to lengthen your journey, so an equal portion of the road behind you falls into ruin. Should you fail to keep your speed up, and slip behind the line that marks the approaching cataclysm, then your high-score attempt will end and it's back to the drawing board.

name: EndlessCar
summary: The car passes through obstacles to earn points mini-game.

name: Energy
summary: A sci-fi side-scrolling action game for the PC Engine. It was based on a PC-88 game called Ashe.

name: Entails
summary: Entails is a 2D platformer, shooter game where the player must disinfect a human body. The player must go through parts of the human body, fighting both the different viruses and the body's defenses.

name: Enemies: Gone Suburban
summary: Tired of the story? The plot? The looming twists? Take a break and shoot the shit and not in a conversational manner! Like literally, shoot shit!!! Well not actual shit but like, shoot things. Shoot....Enemies!

name: Enkai Buchou 2
summary:
The perfect game for the banquet season!

Let's earn points by drinking with senior employees and talking to the president!
Let's do our best to get promoted while collecting cosplay goods for banquet equipment with the points we earn.

It has evolved significantly from the previous work "Enkai Buchou" where the elements of the mini-game collection were strong, and it is now possible to enjoy the game in an adventure way due to the structure according to the story and events.

It's even more powerful than the previous work. Try "Enkai Buchlu 2"! Overcome the demon president's order with banquet performance.

This is the flower path of success! I'm going to drink as ordered.

Get the heart of your employees!!

The managing director is being targeted by mosquitoes!
Protect your tasty skin!

The lonely president is calling.
Run over and talk to someone!

"Wear" the drunken bosses!

Let's take a taxi!

name: En Tactico
summary: The strategy is our everything. In this tactical theater of figures you have to go on your heads. Move your figure to destroy all enemy figures on the level to pass to the next test. Your enemies are card figures that you can defeat by going over them from the back or side. This also applies to your character. The one who walks last, wins. At some levels, there are teleports that help to move the turn queue.

name: Engineer Arena
summary: Engineer Arena is a frantic first-person shooter centered around earning "bits" used to buy weapons, grenades, and new abilities at any time, and using those to defeat your friends in classic console-inspired split-screen FPS action.

name: Enga Extreme Battle Race
summary: Time to battle race

name: Enspell
summary: “Enspell” is deck building-RogueLike game based on a medieval fantasy where you unravel secrets and explore to seek treasures. While you fight against monsters in dangerous dungeons, you can collect trophies and make your own deck.

name: Enemy Inside
summary: Enemy Inside is a mix of action-strategy-racing-and RPG. A game that immerses the player in difficult combat situations from which there is no clear way out and a 100% guarantee of survival.

name: EnGaCho: Dreamy Butterfly
summary: The path changes depending on player's choices! "EnGaCho" is an arcade-style side-scrolling action game where you advance while defeating enemies and earning money.

name: Enmazened
summary: Enmazened is a navigational exploration adventure through a minotaur filled, trap ridden maze ripe with treasure and adventure around every corner... and there are lots of corners! Will you be the first to reach the center and have your deepest wish granted?

name: Ennichi no Tatsujin
summary: Ennichi no Tatsujin (縁日の達人, lit. "Festival Master") is a video game for Nintendo's Wii console. It was a launch title in Japan.[1] The game is composed of several minigames, all of which revolve around Japanese festivals. This is Namco's first Wii game. It is a spin-off the Taiko no Tatsujin series.

name: Enkindle
summary: Welcome to Enkindle. A relaxing "clear-up" game. Match 3 objects to cook them in the pan. Don't let the pan get too full. Clear all the objects, clear your mind. Randomly generated levels for unlimited relaxation.

name: End of Days
summary: End of Days is an open world horror survival game set in a time where a virus has mutated human beings into the “infected”. A world where players must work together to survive or eliminate the other survivors.

name: Entropy
summary: Entropy is an open-universe science fiction MMO with a strong focus on freeform gameplay and large-scale space combat. Explore a hostile galaxy filled with over a hundred solar systems, each completely explorable, where you can hunt, trade, mine and salvage in order to survive. In Entropy, you can play the way you want, and take part in shaping a universe where you, the players, are in control.

name: Endless Maze
summary: Try to get to the end of the maze, if there is one...

name: Endhall
summary: Endhall is a single-player, turn-based roguelike. Control an artificial intelligence as your combo actions in interesting ways to defeat your enemies and reach the end of the hallway.

name: Enigmatic Worlds
summary: Explore strange and abstract worlds filled with equally unusual but deadly beings of many types. Enigmatic Worlds is an FPS inspired by obscure retro-styled FPS games and Amiga games.

name: Entangle
summary: Entangle takes the simple premise of maneuvering line segments along intersecting paths and combines this with an array of clever mechanics to create a unique and challenging puzzle experience.

name: Endless Ascent
summary: It begins with you waking up in a strange basement after a tranquilizer has been shot, you realize you've been taken hostage. Now, you must escape! Ascend your way out of the mess through a variety of puzzles and avoid traps to ensure your survival.

name: Ends
summary: A highway gothic horror. Your bus was late and now you can't catch your next bus home. You'll need to walk the next couple of miles... alone... at night.

name: Endless Jump: Infinity Loop
summary:
Can play at any time, 1 minute spare time is enough.
Simple game rule, control the ball jump across the columns. Keep it jump forever.
It is very hard, anything go wrong will be game over. You hard to keep play over 1 minute.
You can think this game is 1 minute challenge.

name: Enviro-Bear 2000
summary: The player controls a car-driving bear, as they collect enough food to hibernate for the winter.

name: Enceladus
summary: Enceladus is a shoot'em up inspired by the Playstation & Saturn era.

name: En Route 66
summary: Jose Reynolds, a journalist, for the “Santa Fe Times” in New Mexico, obtains interesting information from his sources, that a few hours ago, not far from “Route 66″, strange animals were found dead. Without hesitation, he left the office and hit the road, riding the highway, and after some time came across one of these…

name: Endless Racing Game
summary: Endlessly race in a top-down perspective before the time runs out.

name: Endless Online
summary:
Endless Online is a MMORPG which was popular in the early to mid 2000s. The game focused mainly on rudimentary PvE gameplay, with a heavy emphasis on socializing. Players would explore the isometric world, discovering new places, completing quests, and acquiring gear. There were many secrets and hidden places, making the world feel enticing to explore.

The game also features a PvP Arena inside of the castle, in which players would queue into single-file lines to be transported to a free-for-all death match. There, 2-8 players would attempt to "tag" each other, timing attacks which would send opponents back to the line queue room. Sometimes players would organize tournaments in which the winners of arena battles would win prizes.

The newest version has released (v29) in June of 2023 and is still active with hundreds of players

name: Energy Island Corp.
summary: Build and manage an electric grid ! At the start of the day, build new infrastructure and plan your day. Once ready, start the day then watch electricity production / consumption in real time to adjust your buildings settings. The growth of the islands depends on you !

name: Enzbots
summary: Split screen, co-op, easy to play, but hard to master. 13 levels, pool, soccer, mini golf while defending your life.4 unique characters, verse an army of enemies, all my own design.Hours of re-playable fun, for any age or skill level, kid friendly, girlfriend friendly, designed to put players in a good mood.

name: Entschuldigung
summary: Entschuldigung (which means ‘sorry’ in German) is a bleak horror story, told by a lost young man who longs to find a place in which he can feel safe. Set in pre-war Berlin, the story is driven by an insatiable curiosity that leads our protagonist down a very dark path into the unknown. As he fights to make sense of his reality, he is also fighting to make sense of himself.

name: End Of Life
summary: End of Life is a third-person shooter that takes place in a city that is fragmented and in constant motion. These fragments that make up the city rotate as if it were a Rubik's Cube, creating different gravitational directions that allow the player to traverse the city.

name: Enkou Girls Collection: Oyaji no Natsu wa Suzushii Loveho de Pakopako Hen
summary: A visual novel from α-MODEL.

name: End Point
summary: End Point is a seven-level PWAD for Doom II. It is a collection of compact, fairly short but action packed maps set in a variety of Earthy themes.

name: Endurium
summary: Ready your plasma blades and face off against wave after wave of incoming beams as you struggle to survive at ever increasing speeds.

name: End of Back World
summary: End of Back World is a Bishojo TPS action game based on the SCP worldview. You must kill mutants in the backroom and cleanse the city. Survive through combat training and weapon modification with items obtained from the back room.

name: Endure
summary: Top-down shooter meets existential crisis!

name: Enchanted Kingdom: Descent of the Elders - Collector's Edition
summary: Play puzzles and brain teasers in one of the best new mystery seek and find hidden object games free! In this one of the top easy search and find object finding games your goal is to find hidden objects needed to become a hero!

name: Engine Evolution
summary: Engine Evolution is a multiplayer racing game that uses similar principles as World of Tanks - with each PvP race, against 11 other players, you gain experience and credits, for which you can buy various upgrades for your bike, or unlock the next bike.

name: Enemy Trench
summary: Enemy Trench is a Roguelike set during the First World War. You play as a British soldier fighting your way through enemy lines hoping to survive. You must contend with an onslaught of enemy soldiers, deadly terrain, gas attacks and more. Do you have what it takes to survive in the Enemy Trench?

name: Endless Rain
summary: Explore the crypt full of traps and mysteries

name: England International Football
summary:
The official England football team game.
· Take on any of 32 international teams
· 8 game modes including European Championship and Int. League
· Head-to-head or co-op play with up to four players
· Commentary and presentation by Gary Lineker and Barry Davies

+ Free DVD 'England's Path to Portugal'

name: Endless Nightmare: Weird Hospital
summary: The new Endless Nightmare game released! The story happens in a scary hospital in the new creepy horror game. Jake wakes up in the scary hospital, he is investigating the case that the people are missing in the Oak Town, dangers are everywhere in the scary weird hospital. What kind of weird and creepy case will he encounter? Many evil eyes are looking at him. What creepy secret is hidden in the scary weird hospital? Jack will take weapons to a contest between justice and evil this time!

name: Energy Fighters
summary: Take to the stars to defend the earth from a vengeance fueled AI determined to destroy our civilisation. The year is 2344 and only a fleet of 5 Energy Fighters remain to hold off the AI attack. Utilize shield polarity defending to absorb enemy shots and re-energise your own ship.

name: Enigmatis Collection
summary:
The highly acclaimed Artifex Mundi trilogy is now available as a bundle! Become a private detective and investigate a mysterious cult in Maple Creek. Follow in the footsteps of the sinister Preacher and explore the foggy Ravenwood Park – a place that harbors more secrets than meets the eye. Travel to the breathtaking Karkhala and figure out a way to find and destroy the mysterious source of evil. 
 
This bundle includes: 
Enigmatis: The Ghosts of Maple Creek 
Enigmatis 2: The Mists of Ravenwood 
Enigmatis 3: The Shadow of Karkhala

name: EndlessChoice
summary: EndlessChoice is a deck-building game that uses dice and cards. players can choose different professions, weapons, and cards, along with various unique items to build their own deck. Players can also invite friends to cooperate in defeating enemies, with a maximum of three people playing together.

name: English Sensei: Teaching in Japan
summary: Take control of a young teacher's destiny! Each decision will influence her relationships and lead her to discover unique endings. Which will you choose?

name: Enter the Gungeon: A Farewell to Arms
summary: A Farewell to Arms is a free update that was released April 5th, 2019. It features 22 new guns, 14 new items, new synergies, a new secret floor with a new boss, two new Gungeoneers, and various quality of life and balance changes.

name: Endzone
summary:
Early text based American Football simulation.
This menu driven manager game puts you in charge of one of the teams of the NFL in a quest to make it to the Superbowl.

name: End of the Road VR
summary: End of the Road VR, a Virtual Reality adventure horror. A game set in an atmospheric environment in a dark misty forest where your goal is to explore your surroundings and survive. Experience the horror from an intense VR perspective.

name: Enchanted Arms
summary: An action adventure role-playing game that has a linear storyline with a somewhat open world to travel through and explore. Along with 4 main playable characters mix your team up with over 100 collectable creatures scattered throughout the game. Uses a turn based battle system with each side on its own 3 by 4 square grid area across from each other. Characters can move a set number of squares on the grid each turn and skills have different area of effect patterns.

name: Endless Furry Killer 3D
summary: Endless Furry Killer 3D is the second installment of the Endless Furry Series! The game is currently a work in progress.

name: Enderal: Forgotten Stories
summary: Enderal is a total conversion for TES V: Skyrim: a game modification that is set in its own world with its own landscape, lore and story. It offers an immersive open world, all for the player to explore, overhauled skill systems and gameplay mechanics and a dark, psychological storyline with believable characters.

name: Enduro Racer
summary: The player rides the dirt bike through five stages and must avoid other riders as well rocks and trees. They can also jump over them with assist from the logs. The game's most definitive feature was the 'Wheelie' feature that allowed players to pull up the handlebars on the cabinet to perform the wheelie.

name: Endless Return
summary: Exciting arcade action game where you will fight against hordes of enemies, upgrade your skills, and choose from a variety of weapons and abilities. With each battle you become stronger and unlock new possibilities. Dive into thrilling battles in captivating world of "Endless Return".

name: Enter the Slayer
summary: Enter the Slayer and engage in fast paced, skill based, exciting isometric directional combat! Build your strength, customize your character and slay your competition! Fight to the top and experience challenging content that will test your skill!

name: Entaku no Seito
summary:
The Title is mostly referred to as "Students of the Round" in English instead of a more direct translation because an English version of the game was never made and the name is a better match for the English subtitle on the cover.
 
It is a dungeon crawling JRPG featuring a bonding system, a trapping mechanic with the ability to lure enemies, and a rivalry system to fight over and steal treasure. It was original released on PC in Japan and was later remade for Xbox 360, under the same name, and Playstation Portable under the name "Entaku no Seito: The Eternal Legend". 

The Xbox 360 version of the game has extra content that includes new monsters, items,  dungeons, background music, as well as new story segments and accompanying artwork.
The later PSP version is likely to have the new features but I was unable to find information about it. 
The re-release of the PC version doesn't appear to have the new features but I couldn't find much information for it.

Both consoles had a special edition released a year after the console ports launch titled "Entaku no Seito (DRPG Selection)" on the Xbox 360 and  "Entaku no Seito: The Eternal Legend (Kadokawa Game Collection)" on the PlayStation Vita.

name: Envoy
summary: You have been created by a mysterious monolith with a single goal: to retrieve five force crystals back to it as quickly as possible. Deal with the plights of space physics, evade the locals, and complete your mission as soon as possible.

name: Enigmarble
summary: Dive into a masmerizing world of puzzles and challenges in Enigmarble, a puzzle game that will test your wits, reflexes, and problem-solving abilities! Play through 80+ levels spanning across 5 visually immersive themes.

name: Endloop
summary: You are trapped in an endless stairway with no end in sight. Solve twisted puzzles and maybe you will escape your fate.

name: Enclave HD
summary:
This classic returns to consoles for the first time in nearly a decade, and comes to PlayStation for the first time ever. Fight in dual campaign during the Great War of Celenheim in this enhanced and upgraded version of the beloved medieval action combat game.

Begin your campaign as a soldier of the Light, defending Celenheim from forces of darkness and the horrid demon king Vatar. Change sides and complete an alternative campaign as a minion of the dark tasked with infiltrating and destroying the Enclave you just sough to protect. Twelve different classes and multiple weapon options create great deployability as you descent dungeons, complete missions, and vanquish your enemies.

name: Entropy
summary: Step into a high-stakes, sci-fi FPS adventure where survival, base-building, and high time-to-kill combat merge in a dynamic, fully explorable spherical world.

name: Endless Reality
summary: Endless Reality is a fantasy turn-based RPG. Help Sol and Luna free their homes from exile while travelling 12 different worlds in this 8+ hour story for Windows, macOS, and Linux.

name: Entangled
summary: Entangled is a 2D puzzle platformer where you control two quantum-entangled cat's at once. Solve each puzzle by making use of the two cats to escape a space research facility. Guide them through their journey.

name: Endless Anime Golf
summary: Are you an anime lover with a passion for golf? This exciting game combines the best of both worlds, with stunning anime visuals and challenging golf gameplay. Best of all, Endless Anime Golf features procedural generation, which means every round is unique and unpredictable.

name: Endling
summary: A short, quirky sci-fi mystery about freedom, choice, and loneliness.

name: Enoah's Quest
summary: Enoah's Quest is a top-down adventure RPG, featuring captivating narrative, stunning three-dimensional visuals, and electrifying gameplay, providing a memorable adventure and action experience.

name: EnHanced
summary: EnHanced is a short linear platform shooter game set in the confines of X-42, a secret government base situated largely underground. Enhance yourself as you blast through enemies while searching for your family. Also Larank the admin is there too and finds most of it pretty entertaining!

name: Enigma Prison
summary:
Combine the mechanics of four unique tools to explore a scientific facility and expose its secrets.
Your play style will shape your adventure in this world full of mysteries to uncover. Learn with your mistakes and evolve to escape from this unique mind prison.

name: Enemy On the Tail!
summary: “Enemy on the Tail!” is a turn-based tactical dueling game about aerial combat. Choose your plane, use its unique traits, anticipate enemy moves, and attack! Or shake off enemies with clever maneuvers! Train against AI and compete with friends online. Ready for takeoff?

name: Endowed
summary: Inherit a gentlemen's club... with conditions.

name: Endless Fighter
summary: Endless Fighter is a stress reliever and functional game.

name: Endless Defence 2
summary: A pretty hard game where you must last it out against ever increasing waves of enemies. If that's boring, go out against scenarios. There are no IAPs, DLCs, or overcomplicated concepts and towers.

name: EndCycle VS
summary: EndCycle VS is a multiplayer action-fighter that's all about winning fast player-VS-player battles by combining strategy, reflexes smart use of the battlefield and your own unique attacks!!!

name: Enthralled
summary:
Enthralled is a hypnotic game about getting seduced and mind-controlled by a demanding vampire queen, played by the Secret Subject!

It uses real hypnosis and toys heavily with D/s dynamics, fractionation, obedience, getting turned into a vampire's mindless thrall, being told to resist trance (and failing), and being made to wear a collar.

name: Enc and the Flying Machine
summary:
Follow the mushroom Enc on her little quest to help her new found friend Torze in making a flying machine, while they discuss about war and how to grow plants that become engines! Also help her in cheer up her old friend Sinal who out of knowhere got kinda down in the dumps for some reason!  
  
Enc and the Flying Machine is a kinetic novel that takes about 30 minutes to read through.

name: Enlisted: Reinforced
summary: In Enlisted, you are not only commanding a single soldier, but an entire squad! This MMO squad based shooter recreates the key battles of the bloodiest war of the 20th century, with hundreds of soldiers, tanks and aircraft taking part in each battle.

name: Entities' Repose
summary: Entities' Repose is a traffic management game where you are tasked with guiding spirits through the rivers of the underworld. you will need to build the way for them, but soon you will find that there are too many entities!

name: Energy Breaker
summary:
Energy Breaker is a tactical RPG in which you play as Myra, an amnesiac young woman with a thirst for adventure. The story begins with Myra being visited in a dream by a mysterious woman calling herself Selphia, only to meet her in real life the next day. On the advice of Selphia, Myra heads to Eltois, the Wind Forest, hoping to catch up with a man who may know about her past. Shortly after arriving at the Wind Forest, Myra joins up with Lenardo, an old scientist who's hunting for the Reincarnation, a legendary flower whose scent is said to have the power to bring the dead back to life...

Energy Breaker utilizes a Tactics Ogre-style battle system, but it also allows the player to freely explore the world. It also includes character designs by Yasuhiro Nightow of Trigun fame.

name: Enoch: Children of fate
summary: The year is 2179. What's left of mankind has been fleeing an unknown menace for 100 years. Take control of multiple characters with overlapping storylines in this Scifi noir point&click adventure game ! Help them face their personnal struggles as greater events unfold aboard Enoch Space Station.

name: Enter the Matrix
summary:
Enter the Matrix is the first video game based on The Matrix series of films. Its story was concurrent with that of The Matrix Reloaded, and featured over an hour of original footage, directed by The Wachowskis and starring the cast of the film trilogy, produced exclusively for the game. It sold one million copies in its first eighteen days of release, 2.5 million over the first six weeks, and ultimately 5 million copies.

First released in May 2003, the same month as The Matrix Reloaded, Enter the Matrix was simultaneously produced with The Matrix Reloaded and The Matrix Revolutions. It was developed by Shiny Entertainment, published by Atari and distributed by Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment for the GameCube, Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 2 and Xbox.

name: Enter the Void to the Holy Mountain
summary: A trans-dimensional life form explores the universe. Through the enormous amount of knowledge it accumulates, it doubts its own existence. Fleeing the intensifying feeling of loneliness, it gets lost on Earth. In the process, it penetrates deep into the consciousness of a civilisation that is helplessly overwhelmed by its own permanently changing reality and its technical developments. One day, the life form plays the 5-dimensional game "Bullets are round so their thoughts can change direction.", and an idea emerges that changes everything.

name: Enemy Zero
summary:
Enemy Zero was the second game to star the digital character Laura Lewis—the first being D.

In E0, gameplay sequences alternate between interactive FMV and real time exploration, both from a first person perspective. The interactive FMV component uses gameplay identical to an earlier Warp game, D.

The real time component of E0 is unique. Enemies are invisible, and location is only possible through the use of sound, with notes of different pitch helping the player find the distance and direction of enemies. Additionally, every gun in the game must be charged up immediately before each shot, and charging a shot for too long will cause the charge to dissipate, after which the charging must start over. Since all available guns have very limited range, this makes timing crucial; beginning to charge the gun too late or too soon will allow the enemy to reach Laura, resulting in an immediate game over.

In Enemy Zero, reloading the gun and moving the character around are mechanics that have been made intentionally slow,[4] which stimulates players to avoid combat and direct contact with the alien enemies as much as possible. In the early segments of the game, avoiding detection is not only recommended; it is required, since the player has no means to defend him or herself without a gun. Enemy Zero is an example of a game containing stealth elements[5] roughly two years before the release of Metal Gear Solid popularized the genre worldwide, though ten years after Metal Gear started the genre in 1987.

name: Entombed
summary: Hunted by some foes you have to escape a maze.

name: Engage
summary:
Engage is a first person shooter made in flash.
You were engaged for combat missions in a research operation on the island full of huge flying creatures.
Enter a free-fire zone where anything that moves is a legit target. Invading insects descending from the skies? Blast them to bits! Upgrade your weapon set to stay one step ahead of your six-legged enemeies!

name: Endless Legend: Shifters
summary: Revamps the Winter system of Endless Legend, adds the Allayi race, and introduces Pearls.

name: Enscroll
summary: Fresh out of Magic Academy with a hefty student loan, you must craft and sell magic scrolls to pay off your debt. Create spells for demanding customers and manage your growing loan payments. Will your magical skills be enough to free you from student debt?

name: Endless Wonder VR
summary: Endless Wonder VR is a colorful VR platformer in which you will need to use unique sticks with unique abilities that can be combined in any way to complete a campaign consisting of various levels with a unique stylized environment, enemies and obstacles.

name: Engine Evolution 2022
summary: PvP racing action is back - with more and better content, and with formulas! Enjoy multiplayer racing action more intense than ever before!

name: Endless Scroll
summary: A game about high school memories, growth, and being online late at night.

name: Energy Airforce
summary:
Energy Airforce: is a PlayStation 2 game that focuses strictly on being an authentic flight simulator.
All aircraft and weapons used in the game are either existing or prototypes used by the U.S. military. Realistic loads of weapons and fuel (although chaff and flares are unlimited) can be viewed from outside or from a realistic cockpit view. When flying the aircraft in cockpit view, the pilot's leg can be seen depressing appropriately.

name: Endless Halo
summary: This is a military competition experience game with a super large realistic map

name: Endeavor
summary: Endeavor is a game about a dwarf trying to uncover an ancient secret. Or maybe it's about exploring, climbing, and swimming. Or perhaps it's about collecting powerups and treasure. Or possibly it's just about killing things.

name: Endless Onslaught
summary: Fight hordes of zombies whilst upgrading your weapons and buying effects in the shop. Carefully make your way around the map, picking up ammo, sneaking around zombies and collecting precious potions. Choose from 4 unique maps, with different shops and zombie types.

name: Endless Fucker
summary: Endless Runner mechanics combined with 3D sexual content, gorgeous ladies, different body types and loads of sexual animations.

name: Endless Chaos: Hordes of the Afterlife
summary: Hack and slash your way through thousands of enemies in this action-packed casual game with rougelike features. Level up and gain access to a variety of abilities that will either increase your chances of surviving or get you killed even quicker.

name: Enemy: Tempest of Violence
summary:
After the discovery of three strange objects near Mars in the year 2031, a research mission is launched. Two hundred scientists step aboard the strange, seemingly unmanned spaceships. But these turn out to be a deadly trap: The crew is ambushed in a merciless attack by reptilian creatures. Only one of the security squadrons manages to survive. It is up to these six soldiers now to execute the large scale rescue mission on their own. Not only are these humans outnumbered by a merciless superpower. Along the way, quite a few surprising turns and revelations await them as well. Hardly anything is what it seems to be...

FEATURES
a gripping story full of surprises, spread across 34 tough levels
many different ways of moving around and interacting
different weapons and other useful items
clear graphics, great details, and realistic shadows
music that fits the action and process of the game
helpful guide system and replay feature
simultaneous 2-player mode (shared screen)

name: Encounters
summary: Encounters is an open-world, Exploration game about hunting for aliens and cryptids

name: Envoy
summary: Vaporize the enemy in this intense vertically scrolling space shooter! The only things you'll need to bring to this battle are a quick wrist and an insatiable appetite for action, so suit up and strap in for the battle of your life!

name: Enemy Mind
summary: Built for PC, Enemy Mind lets you battle your way through 70+ waves of challenging enemies. Deftly maneuver over twenty unique ships, each with different abilities for you to harness. Backed by an all-new chip-emulated soundtrack by the psychoacoustic artist Rainbow Kitten, Enemy Mind features an adaptive story system as innovative as its gameplay. Are you ready to unlock the secrets of Enemy Mind?

name: Enemy 2: Missing in Action
summary:
The adventure in the vastness of cold space continues. After a failed research mission the crew got stuck in alien spaceships. In the fight for survival, they meet old friends and new enemies. It is an emotional roller coaster between despair and hope. The big question is: Will any human ever return to earth?

FEATURES
further story with almost 30 levels
new riddles and non-linear gameplay
miscellaneous possibilities for action
integrated help system
detailed graphic with shadow effects
atmospheric music and sound effects
over 8 hours of exciting gameplay

Experience the fast and complex action adventure in the solo run or with a friend in the excellent coop mode!

name: Entity
summary: Entity is a game about a girl who wakes up with sleep paralysis, a stage between awake and dreaming. She's struggling with moving her body while she's surrounded by shadow creatures, she needs your help to wake up!

name: Energy Airforce: aimStrike!
summary:
Energy Airforce: aimStrike! is the second title in Taito's military flight sim series, and is greatly expanded over its predecessor. Several new types of aircraft have been added, including the F/A-18 Super Hornet, F-15 Eagle, and A-10 Thunderbolt II, and the need to pass license tests to unlock aircraft has been removed.

As before, the game includes a wide range of missions, including both air-to-air and air-to-surface missions, and there is also a mission generator called Strike Mode, where the player can set up a wide range of options and play a free mission.

name: Endless Mountain
summary: Minimalist and intuitive controls: Tilt the phone to the left to turn left. Tilt the phone to the right to turn right. You don’t need to press any buttons! Really simple to play but giving you some really immersive sensations. This is not just another snowboarding game.

name: Endless wandering
summary: endless wondering?

name: Energy Hunter Boy
summary: Energy Hunter Boy is an action/shooter game with procedural levels generation, great storytelling, VOXEL TERRAIN MODELING and resources extraction. The little robot warrior will fight against the mad machines in a fantastic natural setting.

name: Endocrisis Hyperactive
summary: Endocrisis Hyperactive the next top-down shoot em up with intense action. Absorb bullets to increment your power and get new weapons. Pass through levels with a lot of enemies and bullets and, of course, intense boss battles

name: Encore: Summer
summary: A Short and Melancholic Kinetic/Visual Novel

name: Entre.pontos
summary: Viva o inesperado no cotidiano de um universitário nesta história interativa!

name: Enlisted: Sherman IC "Firefly" Squad
Enlisted: Calliope Squad
summary:
This pack includes:

- A premium squad of tankers + T34 Calliope rocket tank (Rank, 5 USA)
- 400 Gold

name: Endless ATC
summary: Endless ATC is a realistic air traffic control simulator with a simple, easy to use interface. The goal is to guide as many planes as possible safely to the runways. Find out how many flights you can manage to control!

name: Enigmatica 2: Expert
summary: Enigmatica 2: Expert is an expert questing modpack for Minecraft 1.12 with over 650 quests to guide you along the way.

name: Enlightened
summary: Enlightened is a survival horror game with strong focus on puzzle solving. Explore the hotel in which you woke up, find clues about what happened, solve puzzles and find a way out, while surviving horrors that awaits you there.

name: End Date
summary: A game about dating a normal person where nothing bad happens :)

name: Energy Shock
summary: A card game that you can only play one card each turn.Energy Shock has a very unique combat mechanic,combines card strategy with roguelike and also generates a personality summary report for each of your choices in the game at the end of each adventure.

name: Enchanted Cavern 2
summary: Find your way to untold riches in Enchanted Cavern 2, a mystical gem-filled adventure for everyone. The legend of the Enchanted Cavern returns and it's up to you to decipher the way to its immense riches. Use your skills to unlock the secrets that guard its location as you explore the secret chamber, a dark tunnel, the deep forest, and more.

name: Enraged Red Ogre
summary:
In a faraway land, the yokai are suddenly rising and running out of control. A small human village is in danger, but Akaoni, a short-tempered red ogre that lives in it, is going on a rampage to defeat the yokai!

Run, jump and BASH as you travel around a mystique land based on old Japan eras with beautiful pixelart, exploring 9 different zones searching for relics that change the world around you with new paths.

name: Endeavor
summary: A sci-fi real-time strategy game with free form base building and all of the typical features found in classic RTS offerings. Construct a base, collect resources, build defenses, train an army, research technology and destroy the enemy. Manage your army with unit formations, patrol routes and attack groups, reveal the enemy through fog of war, monitor the battlefield with radar, one-click support abilities, unique unit attacks, hero units, etc. Combat balanced with a rock-paper-scissor approach to unit balance.

name: Ener-G Gym Rockets
summary: Train in all types of gymnastic activities such as uneven bars, balance beam, vault and more! Create your own floor routine and design your own costumes and accessories. Compete in fun competitions around the world and ultimately become a finalist in the Gymnastics World Championships!

name: Ener-G Dance Squad
summary:
Become a World Class Dancer!

Play as Laura, an athletic and passionate young girl, who dreams of becoming the world champion of modern dance. With the help of her eccentric coach, she will learn new skills and soon reveal her full potential as a dancer. However, the road to victory will be full of surprises.

name: Entropy's Fall
summary: Entropy's Fall is an Action Adventure game and a love letter, from two brothers, to games like Shadow Of Colossus and God Of War but with a 2D twist.

name: Endless Battle
summary:
This is the infinite realm, the perilous land is waiting for your salvation. We were born at the origin of hope, the light of souls weaves the winds, and the power of faith forms the eternal loop. Between the flowers’ blossom and fall, we seek the truth of the world.

Infinite Battlefield is an Open Unrestricted Combat MOBA Game, the game has varied career choices and infinite tactics in borderless world. Players can raise the blade in their hand, explore the unrestricted power, take the new challenge and enjoy the pleasure of different occupations.

name: Endocrisis
summary:
Endocrisis is a challenging shoot'em up videogame with zero lives.
Games of this style usually focus on shooting and evading. But in Endocrisis, it is different since your ship can absorb enemy shots to increase your power and thus resist enemy attacks

name: End of Line
summary:
A game about learning how to die. Figure out how to thwart autonomous repair bots in this puzzle adventure.

Game available on Retro Game Crunch.

name: Endless Alice
summary: "Endless Alice" combines Rogue-lite random elements with RPG strategic character development. In the game, you can explore maps to collect enhancement elements and interact with various creatures to gain special effects or alter gameplay.

name: Entities
summary: We combined fast-paced roguelike combat with a randomized procedural format to make the best third-person single player we could. Entidades is a survival game, which tells the story of a very mischievous boy, who lived in colonial Brazil, suffered from religious abuse and slavery at the time.

name: Envious
summary: Experience the horror puzzle game, Envious, offering both single player and co-op modes. Choose to be Xavier or Xandra where the first is trapped in a house, trying to escape it, while Xandra explores a separate old house to uncover clues facilitating Xavier's escape.

name: Enoki
summary: Enoki is a match-3 mushroom puzzle platformer!

name: Endless World
summary: “Endless World” is a 3D idle casual ARPG. Explore an endless world and become stronger with every battle. Collect rare equipment and recruit over 20 legendary heroes to help you in your adventure. In the end, every defeats you have will only make you stronger.

name: Enemy Engaged: Comanche vs Hokum
summary: Enemy Engaged: Comanche vs Hokum is an attack helicopter simulation game. The game was a follow up to Enemy Engaged: Apache vs Havoc, and interconnectable with it. It was developed by Razorworks. Enemy Engaged 2 is its sequel.
